attributes.action: ensure that all MP's have to abide by the high court decision to publish all their expenses.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Do not allow Harriet Harman, the leader of the house, to use a special parliamentary order that can become law within 24 hours after being debated by MPs and peers to overturn the high court decision in favour of detailed breakdown of MPs' additional costs allowances (ACAs) to be provided under the Freedom of Information Act.
